data.text: @jkwan_md 2/2 I should have thought one at day 10 should be death due to Covid rather than with Covid. It seems that many comobilities are getting deaths classified as "with Covid" rather than "Due to Covid" since they are fairly sick anyway according to reasoning I heard- under counting

@jkwan_md Mom and dad's non profit LTC,  positive staff contact lead to 12 resident covid cases 8 days later & 20 residents plus some staff cases  at 14 days. Recently 3 deaths were revised "with COVID" including 1 at day 10. I am sorry a floor of 32 does not usually have 3 deaths in month

@WearySky @mfphotograph @jkwan_md People are smart enough to realize that dose 3 doesn't provide much more protection than 2, so they don't bother. And many people had Omicron, so no point. The real risk reduction from getting a booster is tiny anyways for most. You can get injected every 3 months if you want.
@claudineBoreal @jkwan_md Oh God, really?? Because there are 6 times the number of "fully vaxxed" (2 or 3 doses) people compared to the unvaccinated. These numbers are easily accessible.

@jkwan_md Among the COVID-positive patients in hospital are 199 unvaccinated people, 39 partially vaccinated people, and 476 fully vaccinated people. Can you explain to me why the fully vaccinated # is higher?
@MrCanSays @jkwan_md Not compared to our dismal Healthcare capacity
@jkwan_md those hospitalization and icu numbers look good though in an province of 15Million people no?
